desc: Nashville based company offering hand-painted Polish pottery from Boleslawiec, Poland. Products available from several factories including Ceramika Artystyczna, Kalich, Manufaktura, Galia, and Andy. Heirloom Quality pottery safe for use in the oven, microwave, dishwasher, and freezer. Based in Mt. Juliet, TN.

layout.text:
Bringing Hand-painted Happiness
From Boleslawiec, Poland to Nashville, TN
